description: Deletes faces from a collection. You specify a collection ID and an array of face IDs to remove from the collection. This operation requires permissions to perform the rekognition:DeleteFaces action.

parameters.name: CollectionId
parameters.description: Collection from which to remove the specific faces.

parameters.name: FaceIds
parameters.description: An array of face IDs to delete. (string) ---

nested_items.name: DeletedFaces
nested_items.description: An array of strings (face IDs) of the faces that were deleted.

nested_items.name: UnsuccessfulFaceDeletions
nested_items.description: An array of any faces that weren't deleted.

nested_items.name: FaceId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier assigned to the face.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: A provided ID for the UserID. Unique within the collection.

nested_items.name: Reasons
nested_items.description: The reason why the deletion was unsuccessful.
